attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: the nation is being duped - legally!!! please look into this because it just isnt fair, i have calculated odds of more than 80 million to 1 on more than 5 different players, this wont stand. help

rejection.details: Your title and petition should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement, about Government policy.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
